headline: This company believes an extremely generous paid parental leave is one of the best ways to retain employees
summary: HPE offers 26 weeks of paid leave for all new parents and expects workers to take the full time, if not more.

raw.headline: This company believes an extremely generous paid parental leave is one of the best ways to retain employees

headline: HPE's Transformation: From Server Maker To Platform Provider
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise is transforming from legacy HP, focusing on servers, cloud, and consulting, with significant M&A activity enhancing its portfolio. Read why HPE is a Buy.

headline: Here’s why Hewlett Packard Enterprises expanded their paid parental leave policy and never looked back
summary: Employees are eligible for 26 weeks of fully paid parental leave.
